snippet.title: Magical Drop Plus One, Very Hard & No Continues!
snippet.description:
This is the updated version of Magical Drop. The controls are a big step up, it doesn't immediately cut to the battles and there's a solo mode. Each character does have post-battle dialogue.

I haven't tried out the Arcade Hits the game but this one is worth checking out.

The game is played from MAME using a PS4 controller and recorded via Bandicam.


Don't forget to like, comment & share!

Social Media:

Ask for PSN ID, Discord (MOST ACTIVE)

Twitter https://twitter.com/TrevgauntletNeu (MOST ACTIVE)

DeviantArt: http://trevgauntlet.deviantart.com/

Steam: steamcommunity.com/id/Trevgauntlet

Like what you guys see and would consider supporting my channel? Please donate to my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=5817027
